props.name: children
props.description: content rendered inside the About Modal.

props.name: className
props.description: additional classes added to the About Modal

props.name: isOpen
props.description: Flag to show the  About modal

props.name: onClose
props.description: A callback for when the close button is clicked

props.name: productName
props.description: Product Name

props.name: trademark
props.description: Trademark information

props.name: brandImageSrc
props.description: the URL of the image for the Brand.

props.name: brandImageAlt
props.description: the alternate text of the Brand image.

props.name: logoImageSrc
props.description: the URL of the image for the Logo.

props.name: logoImageAlt
props.description: the alternate text of the Logo image.
Additional props are passed and spread to Modal content container <div>
